sentences.en: A small hole or crevice peep.
sentences.cn: 在墙壁或石头等上面的小开口;裂缝.

sentences.en: And a roach spans a crevice in the floor.
sentences.cn: 一只蟑螂爬过了地板的裂缝.

sentences.en: Every crevice in these walls has been filled with putty.
sentences.cn: 这几堵墙的每个裂缝都用油灰补塞上了.

sentences.en: Every crevice was sprouting grass and even small wildflowers.
sentences.cn: 石壁的裂缝里长满了野草甚至小野花.

sentences.en: He edged the tool into the crevice.
I saw a plant growing out of a crevice in the wall.
sentences.cn: 我看到墙缝里长出一棵草来.

sentences.en: Independent circuit design for high and low crevice.
sentences.cn: 高低间隙单独电路设计.

sentences.en: Or in black and white crevice sad ash?
sentences.cn: 还是黑白夹缝中沉闷的灰?

sentences.en: Pitting, crevice corrosion and layer corrosion occurred on 180 YS and LF 21 M.
sentences.cn: LF21M除点蚀 、 缝隙腐蚀外还发生层间腐蚀.

sentences.en: small creatures that hide in crevices in the rock
sentences.cn: 藏在岩石缝里的小生物

sentences.en: Some tiny plants grow in the crevice of the stone wall.
sentences.cn: 有些小植物从石墙的裂缝中长出来.

sentences.en: Striving for life in crevice is the realistic circumstances of centual China.
sentences.cn: 在西部和东部经济阔步前进的同时,“夹缝之中求生存”才是中部经济的真实境遇.

sentences.en: Sunlight sneaks through a crevice in Antelope Canyon near Page, Arizona.
sentences.cn: 阳光潜入透过缝隙在羚羊峡谷附近的一页, 亚利桑那州.

sentences.en: The concrete and brick structure often produce crevice because of temperature changing.
sentences.cn: 砖混结构常因温度变化而产生裂缝.

sentences.en: There is a crevice in the wall.
Whether the legal crevice has reserved what space?
sentences.cn: 法律的空隙是否预留了什么空间?

phrases.tran_cn: 缝隙腐蚀；裂隙腐蚀；接触腐蚀；隙间腐蚀

trans.tran_en: a narrow crack in the surface of something, especially in rock
